mapper.select: select a.low_dept_no, a.set_date, a.open, a.close from set_homepage a join (select low_dept_no, max(set_date) as last from set_homepage group by low_dept_no) b on a.low_dept_no = b.low_dept_no and a.set_date = b.last order by low_dept_no asc
select low_dept_no, set_date, open, close from set_homepage where low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no} order by set_date desc
mapper.update: update set_homepage set low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no}, set_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), open = #{open}, close = #{close} where set_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and low_dept_no = #{low_dept_no}
mapper.insert: insert into set_homepage(set_date, low_dept_no, open, close) values(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy'-mm-dd), #{low_dept_no}, #{open}, #{close})
